meanings.definition: The quality of being lovable or endearing.
meanings.sent1: Her lovability shone through in every smile and kind gesture.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's lovability made it impossible to resist cuddling with him.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's lovability reached new heights when she shared her toys with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The lovability of the kitten was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The lovability of the character in the movie left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The ability to inspire affection or admiration.
meanings.sent1: His lovability was evident in the way he always helped others without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent2: The actress's lovability on screen made her a favorite among fans.
meanings.sent3: The clown's lovability was so contagious that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The lovability of the old bookstore was like a beacon drawing book lovers from far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The lovability of the little girl's artwork brought joy to everyone who saw it.
